text: Ezɨ me kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ onganis ti.” Ezɨ a bar gavgavigha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Puvatɨ. Guizbangɨra a iti.” Ezɨ me a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ ti an enselɨn gani.”(12:15) Dughiar kam Judan avɨriba kamaghɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavim iti, enselɨn maba gumazibar ganamin ingangariba iti. Egha me ghaze, Pitan ensel markiama.
